welcome_screen.title:
Welcome to
NeverSkip
welcome_screen.text1: Hey there! I have been working hard to make my dream app for building workout plans and tracking my progress.
welcome_screen.text2: I hope you will love using NeverSkip to track and plan your perfect workouts.

home.no_active_goals:
You don't have any active goals.
Press + to add one.
home.no_achievements:
You do not have any achievements yet.
Add one by completing a goal.
home.title: Let's find you a Workout!
home.subtitle: Good {}, {}!

exercises.title: All Exercises
exercises.subtitle: Find an Exercise
exercises.subtitle_add_progress_monitor: Select a new personal record display

workouts.title: All Workout Plans
workouts.subtitle: Find your perfect Workout Plan
workouts.delete_text: Do you want to delete this Workout Plan? This cannot be undone!
workouts.action_the_workout_long: Do you want to {} the workout?
workouts.select_another_startdate: You can modify your starting date if you want.

progress.no_last_workout: No workouts in the last few days

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Make it fit your needs perfectly

reload_caches.title: Reload caches from Database
reload_caches.popup_title: Reload cached data from the Database?
reload_caches.popup_description: Reload if you think the cached data might be corrupted.

reset_settings.title: Reset Settings
reset_settings.description:
This will delete all settings and most cached data from your device.

All data stored in the cloud (sets, exercises, workouts, ...) and your account will not be deleted.

Use this if the App is not behaving correctly.

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.heading_happiness: How happy are you with this app?
feedback.heading_text_feedback: Would you like to give additional feedback?

picture.title: Profile Picture
picture.description: Your new profile picture may not be immediately visible in the app. If your profile picture doesn't change within a few seconds you can restart the app.

date_of_birth.title: Date of Birth
date_of_birth.description: Your birthday is used to calculate your current age.

sign_out.title: Sign Out
sign_out.text: Do you want to sign out?

user.disable_analytics_description:
Analytics are collected anonymously and are not shared with others.
They help us provide you a better experience.

delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.description: Do you really want to delete your account? This action can not be undone and ALL your data will be lost!
delete_account.enter_pw_title: Enter your password below to make sure its you.

reason.title: Please tell us why you want to delete your account.
reason.not_enough_features: It doesn't do everything I need

delete_account.contact: If you have any issues of suggestions we would love to hear from you at neverskipfitness@icloud.com.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in and continue so that you can remain healthy by following your daily goals and plans.
login.subtitle_signup: Sign up and create an account so that you can remain healthy by following your daily goals and plans.
login.need_to_accept_tc: You need to accept the Terms & Conditions to use this app.

trial.discount_description: If you purchase within the trial period you get a discount!
trial.help_text: If you have any questions regarding the purchase process feel free to contact me at neverskipfitness@icloud.com.
trial.purchase_pending_text: Purchase is pending, please keep the app open until the purchase is completed.
trial.trial_description:
You get a generous {} day free trial, so you have enough time to test and use all features.

If you purchase the app within the trial period you get a small discount!

trial_over_dialog.title: Trial period over
trial_over_dialog.description: Your trial period is over. You have to buy the app in order to use all its features again.

misc.name: Name
misc.delete_activity: Do you want to delete the Exercise? This cannot be undone!
misc.delete_workout: Do you want to delete the workout plan? This cannot be undone!
misc.set_reps_and_sets: Set the desired number of sets and reps for this exercise.
